name: The Last Lecture
description:
Summary

"The Last Lecture" is a 3D top-down shooter/survival game made in Unity that puts players in the shoes of students unknowingly attending their last lecture before a zombie apocalypse swept the FEUP campus. With no time to prepare, these students must use their wits and weapons found around the campus to fight off hordes of undead and survive in this new, dangerous world. Armed with an arsenal of weapons found around the campus, players must scavenge for food and supplies. With no end goal in sight other than to survive as long as possible, it's a battle to the death against waves of the undead. Will you be able to stay alive and outlast the zombie apocalypse?

Objectives

Survive for as long as you can against multiple hordes of enemies! See how long you can last and how many you can kill.

Developer Record: 20:05 with 666 kills

How to Play
  • Mouse Move - Move the pointer
  • Mouse Left Click - Shoot / Attack
  • WASD - Character Movement
    • W - Forward
    • A - Left
    • S - Backward
    • D - Right
  • TAB - Open the Inventory
  • SPACE - Switch to the next weapon
  • Q - Drop the current weapon
  • E - Pickup items
  • R - Reload the current weapon
A small note on versions

The WebGL build has some issues with the item collisions with the ground. The preferred way to play is either through the Linux or Windows versions.
